department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: General Construction Services Standing Offer, Cold Lake
description: {  "needed_result": "provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, supervision and material necessary to provide general construction services to buildings and structures at 4 Wing Cold Lake and Primrose Lake Evaluation Range (PLER) as requested by Department of National Defence (DND) in the form of call ups as specified in the Statement of Work",  "number_of_firms_involved": up to three firms,  "number_of_years": "(3) years with option (1)ywar.}
